AddImportListExclusionHelpText: Prevent artist from being added to Lidarr by Import lists
AllowFingerprintingHelpText: Use fingerprinting to improve accuracy of track matching
AllowFingerprintingHelpTextWarning: This requires Lidarr to read parts of the file which will slow down scans and may cause high disk or network activity.
AnalyticsEnabledHelpText: Send anonymous usage and error information to Lidarr's servers. This includes information on your browser, which Lidarr WebUI pages you use, error reporting as well as OS and runtime version. We will use this information to prioritize features and bug fixes.
AnchorTooltip: This file is already in your library for a release you are currently importing
AnyReleaseOkHelpText: Lidarr will automatically switch to the release best matching downloaded tracks
ApplyTagsHelpTexts1: How to apply tags to the selected artist
ApplyTagsHelpTexts2: Add: Add the tags the existing list of tags
ApplyTagsHelpTexts4: Replace: Replace the tags with the entered tags (enter no tags to clear all tags)
ArtistNameHelpText: The name of the artist/album to exclude (can be anything meaningful)
AuthenticationMethodHelpText: Require Username and Password to access Lidarr
AutoRedownloadFailedHelpText: Automatically search for and attempt to download a different release
BackupFolderHelpText: Relative paths will be under Lidarr's AppData directory
BackupIntervalHelpText: Interval to backup the Lidarr DB and settings
BackupRetentionHelpText: Automatic backups older than the retention period will be cleaned up automatically
BindAddressHelpText: Valid IPv4 address or '*' for all interfaces
BlocklistHelpText: Prevents Lidarr from automatically grabbing these files again
CalendarWeekColumnHeaderHelpText: Shown above each column when week is the active view
CancelMessageText: Are you sure you want to cancel this pending task?
CertificateValidationHelpText: Change how strict HTTPS certification validation is. Do not change unless you understand the risks.
ChangeHasNotBeenSavedYet: Change has not been saved yet
ChmodFolderHelpText: Octal, applied during import/rename to media folders and files (without execute bits)
ChmodFolderHelpTextWarning: This only works if the user running Lidarr is the owner of the file. It's better to ensure the download client sets the permissions properly.
ChownGroupHelpText: Group name or gid. Use gid for remote file systems.
ChownGroupHelpTextWarning: This only works if the user running Lidarr is the owner of the file. It's better to ensure the download client uses the same group as Lidarr.
CollapseMultipleAlbumsHelpText: Collapse multiple albums releasing on the same day
CopyUsingHardlinksHelpText: Use Hardlinks when trying to copy files from torrents that are still being seeded
CopyUsingHardlinksHelpTextWarning: Occasionally, file locks may prevent renaming files that are being seeded. You may temporarily disable seeding and use Lidarr's rename function as a work around.
CreateEmptyArtistFoldersHelpText: Create missing artist folders during disk scan
CutoffHelpText: Once this quality is reached Lidarr will no longer download albums
DefaultMetadataProfileIdHelpText: Default Metadata Profile for artists detected in this folder
DefaultMonitorOptionHelpText: Which albums should be monitored on initial add for artists detected in this folder
DefaultQualityProfileIdHelpText: Default Quality Profile for artists detected in this folder
DefaultTagsHelpText: Default Lidarr Tags for artists detected in this folder

DownloadWarningCheckDownloadClientForMor: Download warning: check download client for more details

EnableColorImpairedModeHelpText: Altered style to allow color-impaired users to better distinguish color coded information
EnableCompletedDownloadHandlingHelpText: Automatically import completed downloads from download client
EnableHelpText: Enable metadata file creation for this metadata type
EnableSslHelpText: Requires restart running as administrator to take effect
EpisodeDoesNotHaveAnAbsoluteEpisodeNumbe: Episode does not have an absolute episode number
ExistingAlbumsData: Monitor albums that have files or have not released yet
ExtraFileExtensionsHelpTexts1: Comma separated list of extra files to import (.nfo will be imported as .nfo-orig)
FirstAlbumData: Monitor the first albums. All other albums will be ignored
ForeignIdHelpText: The Musicbrainz Id of the artist/album to exclude

FutureDaysHelpText: Days for iCal feed to look into the future

HostHelpText: The same host you specified for the remote Download Client
ICalHttpUrlHelpText: Copy this URL to your client(s) or click to subscribe if your browser supports webcal
IfYouDontAddAnImportListExclusionAndTheA: If you don't add an import list exclusion and the artist has a metadata profile other than 'None' then this album may be re-added during the next artist refresh.
IgnoredHelpText: The release will be rejected if it contains one or more of terms (case insensitive)
ImportExtraFilesHelpText: Import matching extra files (subtitles, nfo, etc) after importing an track file
IncludeUnknownArtistItemsHelpText: Show items without a artist in the queue, this could include removed artists, movies or anything else in Lidarr's category
IndexerIdHelpText: Specify what indexer the profile applies to

IndexerIdvalue0OnlySupportedWhenIndexerI: Only supported when Indexer is set to (All)
InstanceNameHelpText: Instance name in tab and for Syslog app name
IsCutoffUpgradeUntilThisQualityIsMetOrEx: Upgrade until this quality is met or exceeded
IsInUseCantDeleteAMetadataProfileThatIsA: Can't delete a metadata profile that is attached to an artist or import list

IsTagUsedCannotBeDeletedWhileInUse: Cannot be deleted while in use

LatestAlbumData: Monitor the latest albums and future albums
LaunchBrowserHelpText: Open a web browser and navigate to Lidarr homepage on app start.

LidarrSupportsAnyIndexerThatUsesTheNewzn: Lidarr supports any indexer that uses the Newznab standard, as well as other indexers listed below.
LidarrSupportsMultipleListsForImportingA: Lidarr supports multiple lists for importing Albums and Artists into the database.
LocalPathHelpText: Path that Lidarr should use to access the remote path locally

MaximumSizeHelpText: Maximum size for a release to be grabbed in MB. Set to zero to set to unlimited.
MetadataProfileIdHelpText: Metadata Profile list items should be added with
MetadataSourceHelpText: Alternative Metadata Source (Leave blank for default)
MinimumAgeHelpText: Usenet only: Minimum age in minutes of NZBs before they are grabbed. Use this to give new releases time to propagate to your usenet provider.
MinimumFreeSpaceWhenImportingHelpText: Prevent import if it would leave less than this amount of disk space available
MissingAlbumsData: Monitor albums that do not have files or have not released yet
MonitorAlbumExistingOnlyWarning: This is a one off adjustment of the monitored setting for each album.  Use the option under Artist/Edit to control what happens for newly added albums
MonitoredHelpText: Download monitored albums from this artist

MonitorNewItemsHelpText: Which new albums should be monitored
Name: Name
NoTagsHaveBeenAddedYetAddTagsToLinkArtis: No tags have been added yet. Add tags to link artists with delay profiles, restrictions, or notifications. Click <Link to='https://wiki.servarr.com/lidarr/settings#tags'>here</Link> to find out more about tags in Lidarr.
PageSizeHelpText: Number of items to show on each page
PastDaysHelpText: Days for iCal feed to look into the past
PathHelpText: Root Folder containing your music library
PathHelpTextWarning: This must be different to the directory where your download client puts files
PreferredHelpTexts1: The release will be preferred based on the each term's score (case insensitive)
PreferredHelpTexts2: A positive score will be more preferred
PreferredHelpTexts3: A negative score will be less preferred
ProtocolHelpText: Choose which protocol(s) to use and which one is preferred when choosing between otherwise equal releases
ProxyBypassFilterHelpText: Use ',' as a separator, and '*.' as a wildcard for subdomains
ProxyPasswordHelpText: You only need to enter a username and password if one is required. Leave them blank otherwise.
ProxyUsernameHelpText: You only need to enter a username and password if one is required. Leave them blank otherwise.
QualityProfileIdHelpText: Quality Profile list items should be added with
ReadTheWikiForMoreInformation: Read the Wiki for more information
RecycleBinCleanupDaysHelpText: Set to 0 to disable automatic cleanup
RecycleBinCleanupDaysHelpTextWarning: Files in the recycle bin older than the selected number of days will be cleaned up automatically
RecycleBinHelpText: Track files will go here when deleted instead of being permanently deleted
RemotePathHelpText: Root path to the directory that the Download Client accesses
RemoveCompletedDownloadsHelpText: Remove imported downloads from download client history
RemoveDownloadsAlert: The Remove settings were moved to the individual Download Client settings in the table above.
RemoveFailedDownloadsHelpText: Remove failed downloads from download client history
RemoveHelpTextWarning: Removing will remove the download and the file(s) from the download client.
RemoveSelectedMessageText: Are you sure you want to remove the selected items from the blocklist?
RenameTracksHelpText: Lidarr will use the existing file name if renaming is disabled
ReplaceIllegalCharactersHelpText: Replace illegal characters. If unchecked, Lidarr will remove them instead
RequiredHelpText: The release must contain at least one of these terms (case insensitive)
RescanAfterRefreshHelpText: Rescan the artist folder after refreshing the artist
RescanAfterRefreshHelpTextWarning: Lidarr will not automatically detect changes to files when not set to 'Always
ResetAPIKeyMessageText: Are you sure you want to reset your API Key?
RetentionHelpText: Usenet only: Set to zero to set for unlimited retention
RootFolderPathHelpText: Root Folder list items will be added to
RssSyncIntervalHelpText: Interval in minutes. Set to zero to disable (this will stop all automatic release grabbing)
SceneNumberHasntBeenVerifiedYet: Scene number hasn't been verified yet
ScrubAudioTagsHelpText: Remove existing tags from files, leaving only those added by Lidarr.
SearchForAllCutoffUnmetAlbums: Search for all Cutoff Unmet albums
SetPermissionsLinuxHelpText: Should chmod be run when files are imported/renamed?
SetPermissionsLinuxHelpTextWarning: If you're unsure what these settings do, do not alter them.
ShouldMonitorHelpText: Monitor artists and albums added from this list
ShouldMonitorExistingHelpText: Automatically monitor albums on this list which are already in Lidarr
ShouldSearchHelpText: Search indexers for newly added items.  Use with caution for large lists.
ShowCutoffUnmetIconHelpText: Show icon for files when the cutoff hasn't been met
ShownAboveEachColumnWhenWeekIsTheActiveV: Shown above each column when week is the active view
SkipFreeSpaceCheckWhenImportingHelpText: Use when Lidarr is unable to detect free space from your artist root folder
SkipredownloadHelpText: Prevents Lidarr from trying download alternative releases for the removed items
SorryThatAlbumCannotBeFound: Sorry, that album cannot be found.
SorryThatArtistCannotBeFound: Sorry, that artist cannot be found.
